fields.name: siteCode
fields.title: Site Code
fields.description: A unique identifier or code assigned to a specific location or site where the survey is conducted.

fields.name: siteBounds
fields.title: Site Bounds
fields.description: A data field that uses the Well-Known Text (WKT) format to describe the spatial boundaries or geometry of a specific survey site.

fields.name: siteLatitude
fields.title: Site Latitude
fields.description: The geographical latitude coordinate of a particular survey site.

fields.name: siteLongitude
fields.title: Site Longitude
fields.description: The geographical longitude coordinate of a particular survey site.

fields.name: datum
fields.title: Datum
fields.description: The reference geodetic datum used to define the Earth's shape and its coordinate system for recording the geographical coordinates of the survey site.

fields.name: startDate
fields.title: Site Start Date/Time
fields.description: The specific date and time at which a survey or data collection activity at a particular site begins.

fields.name: endDate
fields.title: Site End Date/Time
fields.description: The specific date and time at which a survey or data collection activity at a particular site concludes.

fields.name: methodology
fields.title: Methodology
fields.description: A detailed description of the methods and procedures used to conduct the survey at a specific site.
